snippet.title: Funko Fusion - INVINCIBLE Gameplay Showcase
snippet.description:
Become INVINCIBLE and save the world in Funko Fusion!

Complete the level inspired by INVINCIBLE and unlock Invincible and Omni-Man as playable characters.

Funko Fusion releases September 13 on Steam, PlayStation 5, and Xbox Series X|S. Wishlist us and preorder today!

Also coming to PlayStation 4 on November 15, and Nintendo Switch in December.
